text: mariyu ayane pandilla mida prake (ekkincabade) tigalu mariyu pandilla mida prakani (ekkincabadani) cetla totalu mariyu kharjurapu cetlu mariyu vividha rakala ruci gala pantalu mariyu jaitun (aliv), danim'ma cetlanu puttincadu. Avi konni visayalalo okadanito okati poli untayi. Marikonni visayalalo okadanito okati poli undavu. Vatiki phalalu vaccinapudu vati phalalanu tinandi. Kani vati kota dinamuna (phalakalanlo) vati hakku (jakat) cellincandi. Mariyu vrthaga kharcu ceyakandi. Niscayanga, ayana vrtha kharcu cese varante istapadadu
